intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance concepts (e.g., 5 P's of insurance)
intents.user_motivation: Users want to educate themselves about foundational insurance principles to make informed decisions.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or want to optimize their current plans.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's expertise in simplifying complex financial topics.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle or infographic explaining the 5 P's of insurance.

intents.sub_intent: avoiding common mistakes when dealing with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid costly errors and protect their rights during insurance claims.
intents.search_context: Users search this after an accident or when preparing to file a claim.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide actionable advice backed by ING's customer trust and credibility.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Step-by-step guide with examples of phrases to avoid.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they get the most value from their insurance policies.
intents.search_context: Users search this when filing a claim or negotiating settlements.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's customer-centric approach and digital tools for claim management.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Checklist or actionable tips with real-life scenarios.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to save money on auto insurance while maintaining adequate coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing insurance providers or renewing policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Promote ING's competitive pricing and bundling options for auto insurance.

intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can position itself as a trusted advisor offering digital tools and personalized insights.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive insurance hub with educational resources, cost-saving tips, and claim optimization guides.

quick_wins: Create a checklist for maximizing claims.
Develop an infographic explaining the 5 P's of insurance.
Publish a guide on avoiding common mistakes with adjusters.
strategic_priorities: Build a unified insurance resource hub.
Invest in SEO for high-volume keywords like 'auto insurance cost-saving tips'.
Leverage ING's digital banking tools to integrate insurance management features.
